name: Konfio Limited
description: Developer of an online lending platform designed to offer micro-business loans. The company's platform complements traditional financial analysis and helps clients achieve economic growth through access to credit options with a proprietary algorithm that combines data and technology to measure creditworthiness, providing convenience and affordability to customers who are creditworthy but historically under-served by traditional banking, enabling small businesses to grow their operations and businesses with competitive rates.
